content: *do you want a poncho with a little more room and style this larger-sized pattern is great for guys and gals both the v-styling is both slimming and stylish and the soft homespun yarn guarantees that this will become a cool-weather favorite lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 40709c *chs-mansponcho pdf* skill level easy size one size width 11 \ 28 cm at neck length 30 \ 76 cm homespun® article #790 3 colors 8 balls total 3 balls a b 2 balls c *shown in williamsburg granite edwardian* crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm split ring stitch markers see also mitered man s/unisex poncho - knit 1 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/mitered-mans-unisex-poncho---knit
